name: InboxAI
description: An open-source email domain authentication, real-time deliverability, and email address rectification platform.

entity.name: Shrayan Bhattacharya
entity.description: Open-source enthusiast building developer-first tools around email deliverability and outreach infrastructure.

funding.description: Funding will support domain auto-authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), real-time deliverability analytics, AI-powered email rectification using bounce signals and pattern learning, as well as hosting and community infrastructure.

sustainability.plan: We're building a freemium, API-first email intelligence platform with community support. The open-source core will remain MIT-licensed.
sustainability.maintenance_model: Active development team with quarterly roadmap releases and GitHub community collaboration.

impact.adoption: 100+ beta users and integrations with platforms like Mailchimp, SendGrid, and HubSpot. InboxAI improves open rates by up to 28% through real-time bounce correction.
impact.differentiator: InboxAI is the only open-source solution combining domain authentication, inbox placement insights, and AI-driven email rectification to auto-correct invalid email addresses using behavioral signals.
